alert.note: Alert for Menifee; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:42PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Morgan and central Menifee Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 741 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Frenchburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Frenchburg around 745 PM EDT. Ratlitt around 750 PM EDT. Mariba around 800 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Denniston, Scranton, Big Woods, Wellington, Artville, Korea, Ezel, Stoll, Dan, Pomeroyton and Ebon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
